name: The Killing of Kenneth Chamberlain
description: Based on the true story of the events that led to the death of Kenneth Chamberlain Sr., an elderly African American veteran with bipolar disorder, who was killed during a conflict with police officers who were dispatched to check ...

review.author: hansbuiskool
review.heading: Undermined by overdone..
review.reviewBody: Good topic, realistic case, too bad the film, sadly enough, looses part of it's effectivity as well as part of it's objective credibility in prolonging overacting jobs, and due to it's highly unnessesary overdramatized and horribly pompous musical support.

keywords: death,based on real people,african american,black,hbo max
